text: On 29 May 2018, a man on temporary leave from prison "hunted down" and stabbed two female police officers, then took their guns and used them to shoot and kill the two officers and a pedestrian in Liège, Belgium. The gunman took a woman hostage before he was killed by police. A terrorism investigation has been launched. ==References== Liege attack Category:2010s in Belgium Category:2010s murders in Europe Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in Europe Liege attack Category:Murder in 2018 Category:Murders by blade weapons Category:Murders by firearm Category:Terrorist incidents in 2018
title: 2018 Liège attack
